item.title: Understanding underperformance - a core management skill
item.description: Underperformance doesn’t fix itself—early, fair intervention is essential for individual and team success. This article outlines practical steps for managers.

item.title: Mastering the art of uncomfortable conversations
item.description: Embracing uncomfortable conversations can lead to stronger relationships and better leadership. Learn how to approach them with a structured method.

item.title: How to give formal feedback your team will appreciate
item.description: Learn how to give feedback that drives real change using the Situation-Behavior-Impact (SBI) model and clear expectations.

item.title: Giving feedback that drives change
item.description: Effective feedback is a powerful tool for driving change and improving performance when delivered thoughtfully.
